replies.author: YuiGabriel
replies.txt_content:
貌似要加上BossBar的开关？

  BossBar:
    Enabled: true
    Range: 12
    Color: RED
    Style: SEGMENTED_20
    Title: '&l<mob.name> &7 [&a&l血量：&d&l<mob.hp> /&b&l<mob.mhp> &7]&b&l目标：&f[&c&l<mob.tt.top>&f]'
